author: potuz
content: Oh I had assumed that the condition of the block being after attestation time was given since otherwise you're already competing against 40% of PB and it's hard to justify forking a block as "late" when you have it PB. But still my fear of reaching 10% of the committee in the last 500ms of a slot stands. I was thinking that it makes sense to stagger the condition: 5% by -500ms, 10% at 0 or something like that
